attributes.action: Time to implement Montessory principals in all schools, for free.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to implement Montessory principals in all schools for free.  Education based on individuality, ability, social awareness and not focussed on exams and 'failure. In a Montessory school ''all' children succeed.
Please see the example posted below.

http://www.montessori.edu/FAQ.html.

For additional information please read Phases of Childhood, by Bernard Leiveigoed.

At the moment Montessory education has to be paid for, but I believe that if we are to prevent a recurrance of the riots and looting we have seen recently then this program has to be implemented immediately. To enable children to regain their rightful place in our society, as caring,, productive human beings..
